As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard up to three cards. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card discarded this way.
When Wielder of Stars enters or attacks, acquire an instant or sorcery card.  [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an instant or sorcery card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]
